title: Question about ocean week
body: I'm confused do you have to earn any ocean week contribution points for the upgraded mystery skin prize and if so how many? I can't seem to figure it out and I've read all the FAQs etc

replies.body: Yep - Jakiron and Wind of Destiny are correct - the bonus is unlocked for everyone now that the goal has been reached!
Nope, I don't think so at alll.

> After a goal has been unlocked the reward will be delivered to your account in the next few days if you contributed enough points before it was achieved. *Some of the rewards like Free Champions, Legacy Splash and the **upgrade to Mystery Gifting** will be made **available to all players** in the days following its unlock.*
The Ocean Week Summoner Icon will be released for 1 IP in the store if that goal is reached.
For more information checkout the [Frequently Asked Questions](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ocean-week-faq)

[Source](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek/index.html#goals)
